content: {"locationId": "5785", "organizationId": "4908", "name": "Sipaulovi Village", "address1": "Lower Sipaulovi Subdivision", "address2": "", "city": "Second Mesa", "state": "AZ", "zipCode": "86043", "country": null, "phone": "928-737-2570", "phoneExt": "", "website": null, "latitude": "35.78778", "longitude": "-110.49795", "foodPrograms": "Pop-Up/Mobile Resource", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Near Public Transit", "aboutUs": "Sipaulovi Village is one of the three villages located in Second Mesa, at the heart of the Hopi Reservation. The Village Administration building and food distribution center is located in Lower Sipaulovi near Hwy 264 and State Route 87. We, the Sipaulov Sinom, envision a life of harmony and good life for our people; and that we live in respect for each other. Our mission is to preserve our Hopi way of life to address the challenges of today for a better tomorrow.
